Commands.Thunder&Geocrush: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Low Action Delay.  Grants Mirage S for 3 turns.  Turns to Thunder&Geocrush+ while Mirage S and Mirage L are active.  Mirage S raises Speed and grants BRV Damage resistance.
Commands.Blizzard&Water: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Inflicts Small Speed Down for 2 turns.  Grants Mirage L for 4 turns.  Turns to Blizzard&Water+ while Mirage S and Mirage L are active.  Mirage L raises Max BRV, Attack and Defense.
Commands.Sonic Fangs: 6-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  Breaks all enemies before the attack.  Deals 100% HP damage to all enemies.  Grants Stack Enchant for 6 turns.  Extends the duration of granted Mirage S and Mirage L by 1 turn.  Stack Enchant adds Fire, Ice, Thunder, Water and Earth elements to non-elemental attacks.

Passives.Thunder&Geocrush Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Thunder&Geocrush/+.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Blizzard&Water Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Blizzard&Water/+.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Mirage Keeper: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense while Mirage S and Mirage L are active.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Slightly raises Attack and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Thunder&Geocrush Extend: Increases Thunder&Geocrush's max uses by 1.Grants Mirage S for 3 turns when the quest starts.When using Thunder&Geocrush:- Increases the number of hits to 2.- Slightly raises its total potency.When using Thunder&Geocrush+:- Increases the number of hits to 6.- Moderately raises its total potency.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Blizzard&Water Extend: Increases Blizzard&Water's max uses by 1.Grants Mirage L for 3 turns when the quest starts.When using Blizzard&Water:- Increases the number of hits to 2.- Slightly raises its total potency.When using Blizzard&Water+:- Increases the number of hits to 6.- Moderately raises its total potency.While Mirage S and Mirage L are active:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.- BRV Attack+ is a 2-HIT melee BRV attack with a moderate potency increase.BRV Attack+ also extends the duration of Mirage S and Mirage L by 1 turn.

Weapons.Godhand & Gladius CP: 35: Raises the potency of Blizzard&Water/+.Raises the potency of Speed Down and extends its duration.Deals 100% HP damage to all enemies when using Blizzard&Water+.
Weapons.Mythril Claw & Mythril Knife CP: 15: Raises the potency of Thunder&Geocrush/+.Deals 100% HP damage to all enemies when using Thunder&Geocrush+.
Weapons.Alpha Arm & Gadget Knife CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Sonic Fangs.
